data.name: Unofficial  FCC Challenge -- Basic Algorithm Scripting -- Mutations
data.description:
Return true if the string in the first element of the vector contains all of the letters of the string in the second element of the vector.

For example, `["hello", "Hello"]`, should return true because all of the letters in the second string are present in the first, ignoring case.

The arguments `["hello", "hey"]` should return false because the string "hello" does not contain a "y".

Lastly, `["Alien", "line"]`, should return true because all of the letters in "line" are present in "Alien".

Remember to use [Read-Search-Ask](https://forum.freecodecamp.com/t/how-to-get-help-when-you-are-stuck/19514) if you get stuck. Write your own code.

https://www.freecodecamp.com/challenges/mutations
